segments.text: fine . How ’ s your job going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know if I told you or not , but I decided to start my own business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? That ’ s fantastic . What kind of business is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve started an investment banking firm with some of my old colleagues from Goldman Sachs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it started off a bit slow , but now , business is really booming !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s such great news . I ’ m really happy for you ! Where is your office located ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: our headoffice is here in Beijing , but we ’ re planning on opening up two more offices soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: if all goes well , we ’ ll open one up in Hong Kong in April and another one in Singapore in October .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we ’ re negotiating the final details of the leasing contracts tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , good luck . I hope it all goes well for you tomorrow !
segments.speaker: S1
